text: Infectious virus was detectable in the brain cortex and thalamus at 5 days pi in both JaOArS982 and JaTH160infected mice without significant difference in titer ( Figure 1D ). However, at 9 days pi viral loads of JaTH160-infected mice were significantly higher than those of JaOArS982-infected mice in every region of the brain cortex, thalamus, brainstem, cerebellum and spinal cord ( Figure 1D ).
